pull_request.title: Mentor 2 MOOC related bug fixes and enhancements

update.description:
This pull request addresses issues:

issue #1572 Failure to compile/run without uuid-dev. The uuid-dev library was added to CMake as an optional library. The changes were copied from the GTS triangulation library support.

issue #1574 Crashes when REST server connection fails. An error message is now showed to the user instead. Also, to avoid too many error messages, the user can now "logout" from the REST server. REST messages are queued when they cannot be served.

Jenkins reported 1 unrelated error:
http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-no-gpu/184
update.title: Mentor 2 MOOC related bug fixes and enhancements

content.raw:
a suggestion from user study: 

grey out logout menu option once the user is logged in and vice versa

alternatively, I think you can just have one menu option whose text label just toggles between `login` and `logout`
content.html:
a suggestion from user study:

grey out logout menu option once the user is logged in and vice versa

alternatively, I think you can just have one menu option whose text label just toggles between login and logout

content.raw:
got a warning here:

~~~
/home/ian/depot/clones/gazebo/plugins/rest_web/RestUiLogoutDialog.cc:32:1: warning: unused parameter ‘_parent’ [-Wunused-parameter]
 RestUiLogoutDialog::RestUiLogoutDialog(QWidget *_parent,
~~~

should be able to fix it by passing it to the base class:

~~~
: QDialog(_parent)
~~~
content.html:
got a warning here:

/home/ian/depot/clones/gazebo/plugins/rest_web/RestUiLogoutDialog.cc:32:1: warning: unused parameter ‘_parent’ [-Wunused-parameter]
 RestUiLogoutDialog::RestUiLogoutDialog(QWidget *_parent,

should be able to fix it by passing it to the base class:

: QDialog(_parent)
